fields.name: arrivalDate
fields.comment: Arrival date in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: arrivalTime
fields.comment: Arrival time in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: arrivalDelay
fields.comment: Arrival delay in realtime parsed for displaying in user dialog.

fields.name: arrivalPlatformChanged
fields.comment: Flag to determine whether arrivalPlatform has changed in comparison to planned departurePlatform.
